Name: Stach
Review Text: The sandwiches are really nice, but don't bother going here if you appreciate a good cup of coffee. Today I got a medium sized cappuccino for the price of 3,80. What I got was a milk coffee which contained 90 per cent milk and 10 per cent poorly frothed milk on top.

Name: Stach
Review Text: Croissants are amazing! For sure one of my favorite places to have a break,staff is super friendly and the location is great in the midst of a lively and eclectic shoppimg district

Name: Stach
Review Text: The use plain mozzarella for the mozzarella di bufala sandwich...what a joke

Name: Stach
Review Text: The girls working were very unfriendly and our dinks were 85% milk. Gross. Almost feel like they did it on purpose because I interrupted their chat just by walking in.

Name: Stach
Review Text: I live just around the corner and actually was a loyal customer, the quality of food and coffee dropped down drastically in last year! Bread was from yesterday and the whole sandwich tasteless and dry...the coffee just bad! I am not writing ‚Ä¶

Name: Stach
Review Text: Obviously, all the food here is FABULOUS. I love STACH and the piles of sweet cakes and cookies, home-made sandwiches and other great food make this THE place for a lunch or a quick snack.

Name: Stach
Review Text: Lovely food. However, in this particular location we were served by two very rude girls. Neither of them were friendly towards any of us. We are also each charged more than the display price for sandwiches.

Name: Stach
Review Text: My favorite place. Good sandwiches of really nice bread. They sell nice cakes and cookies. Chai latte is very good!!

Name: Stach
Review Text: Great coffee, location right next to uni buildings.

Name: Stach
Review Text: All sandwiches cost 5.5 euro, makes it easy to order. Brown bread-Carpaccio with avocado(+extra) sandwich recommended! It gets Toooooo crowded at lunch breaks. A line to the left - for ordering and a line to the right - for picking up the order. It's a take-away place.

Name: Stach
Review Text: A place where you can find scrumptious pastries. A good place to drop by to satisfy your confectionaries craving.

Name: Stach
Review Text: Forgive me, as a stranger to this city. Egg white sweets is too expensive, 3.75euro each. I'm disappointed because they're not tasty, too sweet and the inside is still wet and had the raw egg scent.

Name: Stach
Review Text: Sandwiches are always really good and decently priced. Some fresh foods are a bit too pricey. Cooled craft beer is quite cheap on the other side.

Name: Stach
Review Text: Decent enough coffee but the juices and smoothies are very overpriced, approx. 5EUR per bottle. Otherwise good food but much higher quality places available elsewhere.

Name: Stach

Name: Stach

Name: Stach

Name: Stach

Name: Stach

Name: Stach
